name: Tic Tac Boom!
description:
Dodge your way through different procedurally generated levels in order to obtain the world's best burger.

This is my first project ever. Please feel free to comment what you think of it and where I could improve.

Controls
  • W, A, S, D: Move
  • Double Tap W, A, S, D: Dash
  • Space bar: Jump
  • Mouse: Rotate (Only Horizontally)
